description: System-generated unique identifier for this status record.
Business identifier or name of the part location status; likely used in UIs and references; confirm with SME.
Extended description explaining when and how this status should be used.
Boolean flag indicating this is the default status assigned to new part locations.
Boolean flag to hide this status from selection lists and lookup dialogs.
Boolean flag to exclude this status from reports, dashboards, and charts.
Boolean flag marking the status as inactive so it cannot be selected or assigned.
Free-text notes about the status configuration or usage; likely optional; confirm with SME.
Timestamp when the record was last modified by any process or user.
Timestamp of the most recent user-initiated change; may mirror the general last modified time; confirm with SME.
Identifier of the user who created the record.
Timestamp when the record was created.
Identifier of the user who last updated the record.
Timestamp when the record was last updated.
